name: Cellar
text: +1 Action Discard any number of cards, then draw that many.

name: Chapel
text: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

name: Moat
text: +2 Cards When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from your hand, to be unaffected by it.

name: Harbinger
text: +1 Card +1 Action Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.

name: Village
text: +1 Card +2 Actions

name: Vassal
text: Discard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action card, you may play it.

name: Bureaucrat
text: Gain a Silver onto your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from their hand and puts it onto their deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

name: Gardens
text: VP

name: Smithy
text: +3 Cards

name: Spy
text: +1 Card +1 Action Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

name: Thief
text: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

name: Throne Room
text: You may play an Action card from your hand twice.

name: Bandit
text: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

name: Council Room
text: +4 Cards +1 Buy Each other player draws a card.

name: Laboratory
text: +2 Cards +1 Action

name: Library
text: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand, skipping any Action cards you choose to; set those aside, discarding them afterwards.

name: Sentry
text: +1 Card +1 Action Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

name: Witch
text: +2 Cards Each other player gains a Curse.

name: Adventurer
text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

name: Estate
text: VP

name: Duchy
text: VP

name: Province
text: VP

name: Curse
text: VP

name: Courtyard
text: +3 Cards Put a card from your hand onto your deck.

name: Lurker
text: +1 Action Choose one: Trash an Action card from the Supply; or gain an Action card from the trash.

name: Great Hall
text: VP

name: Masquerade
text: +2 Cards Each player with any cards in hand passes one to the next such player to their left, at once. Then you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Shanty Town
text: +2 Actions Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

name: Wishing Well
text: +1 Card +1 Action Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If you named it, put it into your hand.

name: Diplomat
text: +2 Cards If you have 5 or fewer cards in hand (after drawing), +2 Actions. When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from a hand of 5 or more cards, to draw 2 cards then discard 3.

name: Mill
text: 2VP

name: Scout
text: +1 Action Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

name: Secret Passage
text: +2 Cards +1 Action Take a card from your hand and put it anywhere in your deck.

name: Duke
text: VP

name: Patrol
text: +3 Cards Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the Victory cards and Curses into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.

name: Torturer
text: +3 Cards Each other player either discards 2 cards or gains a Curse to their hand, their choice. (They may pick an option they can't do.)

name: Trading Post
text: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you did, gain a Silver to your hand.

name: Harem
text: 2VP

name: Nobles
text: VP

name: Haven
text: +1 Card +1 Action Set aside a card from your hand face down (under this). At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

name: Native Village
text: +2 Actions Choose one: Put the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat (you may look at those cards at any time); or put all the cards from your mat into your hand.

name: Pearl Diver
text: +1 Card +1 Action Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

name: Ambassador
text: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

name: Lookout
text: +1 Action Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one back on top of your deck.

name: Warehouse
text: +3 Cards +1 Action Discard 3 cards.

name: Caravan
text: +1 Card +1 Action At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

name: Island
text: VP

name: Sea Hag
text: Each other player discards the top card of their deck, then gains a Curse onto their deck.

name: Treasure Map
text: Trash this and a Treasure Map from your hand. If you trashed two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Golds onto your deck.

name: Explorer
text: You may reveal a Province from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold to your hand. If you don't, gain a Silver to your hand.

name: Ghost Ship
text: +2 Cards. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from their hand onto their deck until they have 3 cards in hand.

name: Outpost
text: If this is the first time you played an Outpost this turn, and the previous turn wasn't yours, then take an extra turn after this one, and you only draw 3 cards for your next hand.

name: Tactician
text: If you have at least one card in hand, discard your hand, and at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Action, and +1 Buy.

name: Wharf
text: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards and +1 Buy.

name: Transmute
text: Trash a card from your hand. If it is an… Action card, gain a Duchy Treasure card, gain a Transmute Victory card, gain a Gold

name: Vineyard
text: VP

name: Apothecary
text: +1 Card +1 Action Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.

name: Scrying Pool
text: +1 Action Each player (including you) reveals the top card of their deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from your deck until revealing one that isn’t an Action. Put all of those revealed cards into your hand.

name: Alchemist
text: +2 Cards +1 Action When you discard this from play, if you have a Potion in play, you may put this onto your deck.

name: Familiar
text: +1 Card +1 Action Each other player gains a Curse.

name: Golem
text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golems. Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

name: Apprentice
text: 1VP

name: Possession
text: D

name: Potion
text: VP

name: Watchtower
text: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand. When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand, to either trash that card or put it onto your deck.

name: Bishop
text: 1VPVP2

name: Monument
text: 2VP

name: Worker's Village
text: +1 Card +2 Actions +1 Buy

name: Counting House
text: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Coppers from it, and put them into your hand.

name: Mint
text: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it. When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

name: Rabble
text: +3 Cards Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of their deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back in any order they choose.

name: Goons
text: 2VP

name: King's Court
text: You may play an Action card from your hand three times.

name: Colony
text: VP

name: Hamlet
text: +1 Card +1 Action You may discard a card for +1 Action. You may discard a card for +1 Buy.

name: Menagerie
text: +1 Action Reveal your hand. If the revealed cards all have different names, +3 Cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.

name: Farming Village
text: +2 Actions Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure or Action card. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Hunting Party
text: +1 Card +1 Action Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal one that isn’t a copy of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Fairgrounds
text: VP

name: Bag of Gold
text: +1 Action Gain a Gold onto your deck. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Followers
text: +2 Cards Gain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Crossroads
text: Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.

name: Oracle
text: Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, and discards them or puts them back, your choice. They choose the order to return them. Afterwards, you draw 2 cards.

name: Scheme
text: +1 Card +1 Action This turn, you may put one of your Action cards onto your deck when you discard it from play.

name: Tunnel
text: VP

name: Jack of All Trades
text: Gain a Silver. Look at the top card of your deck; you may discard it. Draw until you have 5 cards in hand. You may trash a non-Treasure card from your hand.

name: Silk Road
text: VP

name: Cartographer
text: +1 Card +1 Action Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them, then put the rest back in any order.

name: Embassy
text: +5 Cards Discard 3 cards. When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

name: Inn
text: +2 Cards +2 Actions Discard 2 cards. When you gain this, look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Action cards from it (which can include this), and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Margrave
text: +3 Cards +1 Buy Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

name: Stables
text: You may discard a Treasure, for +3 Cards and +1 Action.

name: Border Village
text: +1 Card +2 Actions When you gain this, gain a cheaper card.

name: Farmland
text: VP2

name: Beggar
text: Gain 3 Coppers to your hand. When another player plays an Attack card, you may first discard this to gain 2 Silvers, putting one onto your deck.

name: Vagrant
text: +1 Card +1 Action Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a Curse, Ruins, Shelter, or Victory card, put it into your hand.

name: Market Square
text: +1 Card +1 Action +1 Buy When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand to gain a Gold.

name: Urchin
text: +1 Card +1 Action Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand. When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may first trash this, to gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

name: Feodum
text: VP

name: Fortress
text: +1 Card +2 Actions When you trash this, put it into your hand.

name: Marauder
text: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

name: Rats
text: +1 Card +1 Action Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats). When you trash this, +1 Card.

name: Wandering Minstrel
text: +1 Card +2 Actions Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Action cards back in any order and discard the rest.

name: Band of Misfits
text: Play this as if it were a cheaper Action card in the Supply. This is that card until it leaves play.

name: Bandit Camp
text: +1 Card +2 Actions Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

name: Catacombs
text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards. When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

name: Cultist
text: +2 Cards. Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand. When you trash this, +3 Cards.

name: Pillage
text: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals their hand and discards a card that you choose. Gain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.

name: Hunting Grounds
text: +4 Cards When you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

name: Ruined Library
text: +1 Card

name: Ruined Market
text: +1 Buy

name: Ruined Village
text: +1 Action

name: Survivors
text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.

name: Dame Josephine
text: 36VP

name: Madman
text: +2 Actions Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Hovel
text: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.

name: Necropolis
text: +2 Actions

name: Overgrown Estate
text: VP

name: Candlestick Maker
text: +1 Action +1 Buy +1 Coffers

name: Stonemason
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it. When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

name: Advisor
text: +1 Action Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card and put the rest into your hand.

name: Plaza
text: +1 Card +2 Actions You may discard a Treasure for +1 Coffers.

name: Baker
text: +1 Card +1 Action +1 Coffers Setup: Each player get +1 Coffers.

name: Journeyman
text: Name a card. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 3 cards without that name. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Soothsayer
text: Gain a Gold. Each other player gains a Curse, and if they did, draws a card.

name: Page
text: +1 Card +1 Action When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Treasure Hunter.

name: Ratcatcher
text: +1 Card +1 Action Put this on your Tavern mat. At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand.

name: Dungeon
text: +1 Action Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, then discard 2 cards.

name: Gear
text: +2 Cards Set aside up to 2 cards from your hand face down (under this). At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand.

name: Guide
text: +1 Card +1 Action Put this on your Tavern mat. At the start of your turn, you may call this, to discard your hand and draw 5 cards.

name: Magpie
text: +1 Card +1 Action Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure, put it into your hand. If it's an Action or Victory card, gain a Magpie.

name: Port
text: +1 Card +2 Actions When you buy this, gain another Port.

name: Ranger
text: +1 Buy Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). Then if it's face up, +5 Cards.

name: Distant Lands
text: VPVP

name: Haunted Woods
text: Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, they puts their hand onto their deck in any order. At the start of your next turn: +3 Cards

name: Lost City
text: +2 Cards +2 Actions When you gain this, each other player draws a card.

name: Royal Carriage
text: +1 Action Put this on your Tavern mat. Directly after you finish playing an Action card, if it's still in play, you may call this, to replay that Action.

name: Hireling
text: At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game: +1 Card (This stays in play.)

name: Quest
text: You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Save
text: Once per turn: +1 Buy. Set aside a card from your hand, and put it into your hand at end of turn (after drawing).

name: Scouting Party
text: +1 Buy Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard 3 and put the rest back in any order.

name: Travelling Fair
text: +2 Buys When you gain a card this turn, you may put it onto your deck.

name: Bonfire
text: Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.

name: Expedition
text: Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.

name: Plan
text: Move your Trashing token to an Action Supply pile. (When you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)

name: Mission
text: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, during which you can't buy cards.

name: Pilgrimage
text: Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.

name: Raid
text: Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts their –1 Card token on their deck.

name: Trade
text: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Gain a Silver per card you trashed.

name: Lost Arts
text: Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile. (When you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action.)

name: Pathfinding
text: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile. (When you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card.)

name: Fugitive
text: +2 Cards +1 Action Discard a card. When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Disciple. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Disciple
text: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Gain a copy of it. When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Teacher. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Champion
text: +1 Action For the rest of the game, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you, and when you play an Action, +1 Action. (This stays in play. This is not in the Supply.)

name: City Quarter
text: +2 Actions Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Action card revealed.

name: Royal Blacksmith
text: +5 Cards Reveal your hand; discard the Coppers.

name: Encampment
text: +2 Cards +2 Actions You may reveal a Gold or Plunder from your hand. If you do not, set this aside, and return it to the Supply at the start of Clean-up.

name: Settlers
text: +1 Card +1 Action Look through your discard pile. You may reveal a Copper from it and put it into your hand.

name: Chariot Race
text: 1VP

name: Enchantress
text: Until your next turn, the first time each other player plays an Action card on their turn, they get +1 Card and +1 Action instead of following its instructions. At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards.

name: Farmers' Market
text: VPVP1VP

name: Sacrifice
text: 2VP

name: Temple
text: VPVPVP

name: Archive
text: +1 Action Set aside the top 3 cards of your deck face down (you may look at them). Now and at the start of your next two turns, put one into your hand.

name: Bustling Village
text: +1 Card +3 Actions Look through your discard pile. You may reveal a Settlers from it and put it into your hand.

name: Capital
text: 66DD

name: Crown
text: If it's your Action phase, you may play an Action from your hand twice. If it's your Buy phase, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice.

name: Emporium
text: 1VP

name: Forum
text: +3 Cards +1 Action Discard 2 cards When you buy this, +1 Buy.

text: VP

name: Triumph
text: VP

name: Annex
text: Look through your discard pile. Shuffle all but up to 5 cards from it into your deck. Gain a Duchy.

name: Donate
text: After this turn, put all cards from your deck and discard pile into your hand, trash any number, shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 5 cards.

name: Delve
text: +1 Buy Gain a Silver.

name: Tax
text: 2D1DD

name: Ritual
text: VP1

text: VP

text: VP

name: Windfall
text: If your deck and discard pile are empty, gain 3 Golds.

name: Druid
text: +1 Buy Receive one of the set-aside Boons (leaving it there). Setup: Set aside the top 3 Boons face up.

name: Faithful Hound
text: +2 Cards When you discard this other than during Clean-up, you may set it aside, and put it into your hand at end of turn.

name: Monastery
text: For each card you've gained this turn, you may trash a card from your hand or a Copper you have in play.

name: Pixie
text: +1 Card +1 Action Discard the top Boon. You may trash this to receive that Boon twice. Heirloom: Goat

name: Fool
text: If you aren't the player with Lost in the Woods, take it, take 3 Boons, and receive the Boons in any order. Heirloom: Lucky Coin

name: Ghost Town
text: At the start of your next turn, +1 Card and +1 Action. This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).

name: Leprechaun
text: Gain a Gold. If you have exactly 7 cards in play, gain a Wish from its pile. Otherwise, receive a Hex.

name: Night Watchman
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, discard any number, and put the rest back in any order. This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).

name: Blessed Village
text: +1 Card +2 Actions When you gain this, take a Boon. Receive it now or at the start of your next turn.

name: Cemetery
text: VP

name: Exorcist
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a cheaper Spirit from one of the Spirit piles.

name: Necromancer
text: Play a face up, non-Duration Action card from the trash, leaving it there and turning it face down for the turn. Setup: Put the 3 Zombies into the trash.

name: Shepherd
text: +1 Action Discard any number of Victory cards, revealing them. +2 Cards per card discarded. Heirloom: Pasture

name: Skulk
text: +1 Buy Each other player receives the next Hex. When you gain this, gain a Gold.

name: Crypt
text: Set aside any number of Treasures you have in play, face down (under this). While any remain, at the start of each of your turns, put one of them into your hand.

name: Cursed Village
text: +2 Actions Draw until you have 6 cards in hand. When you gain this, receive a Hex.

name: Den of Sin
text: At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards. This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).

name: Pooka
text: You may trash a Treasure other than Cursed Gold from your hand, for +4 Cards. Heirloom: Cursed Gold

name: Tragic Hero
text: +3 Cards +1 Buy If you have 8 or more cards in hand (after drawing), trash this and gain a Treasure.

name: Werewolf
text: If it's your Night phase, each other player receives the next Hex. Otherwise, +3 Cards.

name: Bat
text: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. If you trashed at least one, exchange this for a Vampire. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Imp
text: +2 Cards You may play an Action card from your hand that you don't have a copy of in play. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Ghost
text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal an Action. Discard the other cards and set aside the Action. At the start of your next turn, play it twice. (This is not in the Supply.)

name: Zombie Apprentice
text: You may trash an Action card from your hand for +3 Cards and +1 Action.

name: Zombie Spy
text: +1 Card +1 Action Look at the top card of your deck. Discard it or put it back.

name: Pasture
text: 1VP

name: The Flame's Gift
text: You may trash a card from your hand.

name: The Moon's Gift
text: Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.

name: The Mountain's Gift
text: Gain a Silver.

name: The River's Gift
text: +1 Card at the end of this turn. (Keep this until Clean-up.)

name: The Sea's Gift
text: +1 Card

name: The Sky's Gift
text: You may discard 3 cards to gain a Gold.

name: The Sun's Gift
text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them and put the rest back in any order.

name: The Swamp's Gift
text: Gain a Will-o'-Wisp from its pile.

name: The Wind's Gift
text: +2 Cards Discard 2 cards.

name: Bad Omens
text: Put your deck into your discard pile. Look through it and put 2 Coppers from it onto your deck (or reveal you can't).

name: Delusion
text: If you don't have Deluded or Envious, take Deluded.

name: Envy
text: If you don't have Deluded or Envious, take Envious.

name: Famine
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Discard the Actions. Shuffle the rest into your deck.

name: Fear
text: If you have at least 5 cards in hand, discard an Action or Treasure (or reveal you can't).

name: Greed
text: Gain a Copper onto your deck.

name: Haunting
text: If you have at least 4 cards in hand, put one of them onto your deck.

name: Locusts
text: Trash the top card of your deck. If it's Copper or Estate, gain a Curse. Otherwise, gain a cheaper card that shares a type with it.

name: Misery
text: If this is your first Misery this game, take Miserable. Otherwise, flip it over to Twice Miserable.

name: Plague
text: Gain a Curse to your hand.

name: Poverty
text: Discard down to 3 cards in hand.

name: Deluded
text: At the start of your Buy phase, return this, and you can't buy Actions this turn.

name: Lost in the Woods
text: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card to receive a Boon.

name: Miserable
text: VP

name: Twice Miserable
text: VP

name: Border Guard
text: +1 Action Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and discard the other. If both were Actions, take the Lantern or Horn.

name: Ducat
text: +1 Coffers +1 Buy When you gain this, you may trash a Copper from your hand.

name: Lackeys
text: +2 Cards When you gain this, +2 Villagers.

name: Acting Troupe
text: +4 Villagers Trash this.

name: Experiment
text: +2 Cards +1 Action Return this to the Supply. When you gain this, gain another Experiment (that doesn't come with another).

name: Hideout
text: +1 Card +2 Actions Trash a card from your hand. If it's a Victory card, gain a Curse.

name: Mountain Village
text: +2 Actions Look through your discard pile and put a card from it into your hand; if you can't, +1 Card.

name: Silk Merchant
text: +2 Cards +1 Buy When you gain or trash this, +1 Coffers and +1 Villager.

name: Old Witch
text: +3 Cards Each other player gains a Curse and may trash a Curse from their hand.

name: Scholar
text: Discard your hand. +7 Cards.

name: Swashbuckler
text: +3 Cards If your discard pile has any cards in it: +1 Coffers, then if you have at least 4 Coffers tokens, take the Treasure Chest.

name: Flag
text: When drawing your hand, +1 Card.

name: Horn
text: Once per turn, when you discard a Border Guard from play, you may put it onto your deck.

name: Lantern
text: Your Border Guards reveal 3 cards and discard 2. (It takes all 3 being Actions to take the Horn.)

name: Treasure Chest
text: At the start of your Buy phase, gain a Gold.

name: Cathedral
text: At the start of your turn, trash a card from your hand.

name: City Gate
text: At the start of your turn, +1 Card, then put a card from your hand onto your deck.

name: Sewers
text: When you trash a card other than with this, you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Star Chart
text: When you shuffle, you may pick one of the cards to go on top.

name: Exploration
text: At the end of your Buy Phase, if you didn't buy any cards, +1 Coffers and +1 Villager.

name: Fair
text: At the start of your turn, +1 Buy.

name: Silos
text: At the start of your turn, discard any number of Coppers, revealed, and draw that many cards.

name: Sinister Plot
text: At the start of your turn, add a token here, or remove your tokens here for +1 Card each.

name: Academy
text: When you gain an Action card, +1 Villager.

name: Fleet
text: After the game ends, there's an extra round of turns just for players with this.

name: Guildhall
text: When you gain a Treasure, +1 Coffers.

name: Piazza
text: At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Action, play it.

name: Road Network
text: When another player gains a Victory card, +1 Card.

name: Barracks
text: At the start of your turn, +1 Action.

name: Crop Rotation
text: At the start of your turn, you may discard a Victory card for +2 Cards.

name: Innovation
text: The first time you gain an Action card in each of your turns, you may set it aside. If you do, play it.

name: Citadel
text: The first time you play an Action card during each of your turns, play it again afterward.

name: Envoy
text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one. Discard that one and put the rest into your hand.

name: Sauna
text: +1 Card +1 Action You may play an Avanto from your hand. While this is in play, when you play a Silver, you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Walled Village
text: +1 Card +2 Actions At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this onto your deck.

name: Avanto
text: +3 Cards You may play an Sauna from your hand.
